trans-unit.source: Serves as a base class for derived classes that import SOAP transmission protocols into XML Web services.
trans-unit.target: 當做將 SOAP 傳輸通訊協定匯入 XML Web Service 之衍生類別的基底類別。

trans-unit.source: Although this class is designed to serve as the base class for user-defined classes, the current implementation of XML Web services does not support such user-defined classes.
trans-unit.target: 雖然這個類別設計來做為使用者定義類別的基底類別，目前的 XML Web 服務實作不支援這種使用者定義的類別。

trans-unit.source: For more information about specifying protocols for XML Web services, see [[\<topic://cpconbuildingaspnetwebservices>]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01dfc27c-c68e-4910-a0aa-5e4c2a766b0c).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關指定的 XML Web 服務通訊協定的詳細資訊，請參閱[ [ \<topic://cpconbuildingaspnetwebservices >]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01dfc27c-c68e-4910-a0aa-5e4c2a766b0c)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about Web Services Description Language (WSDL), see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.
trans-unit.target: 如需 Web 服務描述語言 (WSDL) 的詳細資訊，請參閱規格的http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/。

trans-unit.source: When you inherit from <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapTransportImporter" />, you must override the following members: <see cref="M:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapTransportImporter.IsSupportedTransport(System.String)" /> and <see cref="M:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapTransportImporter.ImportClass" />.
trans-unit.target: 當您繼承自 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapTransportImporter" /> 時，您必須覆寫下列成員：<see cref="M:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapTransportImporter.IsSupportedTransport(System.String)" /> 和 <see cref="M:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapTransportImporter.ImportClass" />。

trans-unit.source: The default implementations of these members perform no action.
trans-unit.target: 這些成員的預設實作會執行任何動作。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapTransportImporter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapTransportImporter" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, this method uses information contained in the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> object model (available through the <see cref="P:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapTransportImporter.ImportContext" /> property) to add transport-specific code to the class being generated.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，這個方法使用包含在 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> 物件模型中的資訊 (可透過 <see cref="P:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapTransportImporter.ImportContext" /> 屬性取得) 來加入傳輸特定的程式碼至將要產生的類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapProtocolImporter" /> performing the import action.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定執行匯入動作的 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapProtocolImporter" /> 的參考。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapProtocolImporter" /> performing the import action.
trans-unit.target: 執行匯入動作之 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapProtocolImporter" /> 的參考。

trans-unit.source: Derived classes can use this property to get detailed information about the current import context, such as the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription> object model, the current class name, or the current method name.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生的類別可以使用這個屬性，取得目前的匯入內容的詳細的資訊，例如<xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription>物件模型、 目前的類別名稱或目前的方法名稱。

trans-unit.source: A URI representing the transport protocol to be checked.
trans-unit.target: URI，表示要檢查的傳輸通訊協定。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, this method determines whether the specified transport protocol is supported by the XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，這個方法會判斷 XML Web Service 是否支援指定的傳輸通訊協定。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the transport protocol is supported; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果支援傳輸通訊協定，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。
